data.partBlankContent: Sour beers have gotten very popular in the past few years. You c__ find th__ in ba__ that on__ used t_ serve mo__ conventional be___. Many sm___ beer mak___ now of___ one o_ two, especially i_ the sum___ season. They pair very well with berries and soft cheeses.
data.fullContent: Sour beers have gotten very popular in the past few years. You can find them in bars that only used to serve most conventional beers. Many small beer makers now offer one or two, especially in the summer season. They pair very well with berries and soft cheeses.
data.answer: 在过去的几年中，酸啤酒变得非常流行。你可以在过去只供应传统啤酒的酒吧里找到他们。许多小型啤酒制造商现在提供一到两种啤酒，尤其是在夏季。它们很适合与浆果和软奶酪搭配。
